::Ramhorn::

Ramhorn's eyes widen as he realizes he's still alive. He had thought the 
blast would have killed them both. Whatever had stopped the blast however, 
had reversed their deaths.

He looks at Megatron. "Not so fast!"

"Total system shutdown."

With that command, everything in the Ark went out, all the power shutting 
off. Ramhorn looks back at Megatron, once again firing at him.

"This is Ramhorn," he says into his comm-link while firing, "I might need 
some reinforcement at the Ark."
